Digital Innovation Hub strategy
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: DIMECC Ltd is an innovation hub for digitalizing industry in Finland, bringing together top expertise from research and industry. Our international public-private-partnership platform leads our customers to cross-disciplinary and cross-industry innovations and new business. Superior productivity is being generated by the expertise of over 400 organizations and 2,000 people. Where leaders and winner meet – DIMECC.
